lead_paragraph: Rookie goalie Matt Murray made 47 saves while standing up to Washington Capitals' avalanche of shots, and the Pittsburgh Penguins turned two goals a minute apart into a 3-2 victory on Monday in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference semi-finals.

headline.print_headline: Murray Makes His Mark as Pens Beat Caps
headline.main: Murray Makes His Mark as Pens Beat Caps

snippet: Rookie goalie Matt Murray made 47 saves while standing up to Washington Capitals' avalanche of shots, and the Pittsburgh Penguins turned two goals a minute apart into a 3-2 victory on Monday in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference semi-finals....
